message.content:
{"id": "31627", 
 "title": "Bug 31627DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace", 
 "description": "Language: Japanese
Build driver: eclipseSDKI20030211linuxgtk
OS: RedHat8 (Japanese: locale jaJP.eucJP), gtk 2.2
JDK Ver. : IBM JDK1.3.1 + SR3
Summary: DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace

Description:
Steps to recreate problem:
1. ", 
 "OB": "I could not find the details of the problem in the description.", 
 "EB": "After clicking the "Resource Perspective" icon at the shortcut bar (step 12), the workbench crashes and generates a core dump. Please refer to the attached file (cvsdefect.zip).", 
 "SR": "To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a project using DBCS characters (あいうえお(\u3042\u3044\u3046\u3048\u304A)).
2. Right-click the project and select 'Team > Share Project...'.
3. Select the CVS repository.
4. Select the option 'Use project name as module name' and click 'Finish'.
5. Select the project in the Synchronize view.
6. Right-click on the project and select 'Add Version Control'.
7. Right-click on the project and select 'Commit'.
8. Right-click on the project and select 'Delete' (Select 'also delete contents under /workspace folder name').
9. Change the perspective to CVS perspective.
10. Expand the repository and select HEAD.
11. Right-click on the DBCS project and select 'Check Out As Project'.
12. After completing step 11, click on the 'Resource Perspective' icon at the shortcut bar." }

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

', 'SR': 'Create a project using DBCS characters (あいうえお(\\u3042\\u3044\\u3046\\u3048\\u304A))2. Rightclick the project and select TeamShare project...3. Select the CVS repository4. Select the "Use project name as module name" and Finish5. Select the project at the Synchonize view6. Rightclick on the project and select "Add Version Control"7. Rightclick on the project and select "Commit"8. Rightclick on the project and select "Delete" (Select "also deletecontents under /workspace folder name")9.
